Definition: In this task, you need to generate an appropriate title for the given summary of some paragraph. The generated title must be short and should include the main topic of the given text. Your summary should be less than 20 words long.

Positive Examples.input: For many Brazilians, Michel Temer's ascension to president was surprising. But as the first Brazilian president to have charges brought against him while in office, his arrest is less unexpected.
Positive Examples.output: Michel Temer: Brazil's arrested former president
Positive Examples.explanation: The output is a relevant title for the given passage as it highlights the main crux of the given text.

Positive Examples.input: The recent high-profile spat with the US over the Hollywood film "The Interview" painted North Korea's enigmatic young leader Kim Jong-un as impetuous.
Positive Examples.output: Impetuous Kim Jong-un in The Interview
Positive Examples.explanation: Impetuous Kim Jong-un in The Interview is apt and appropriate title for the given text.

Negative Examples.input: The Scottish Conservatives have said radical changes are needed to Scottish schools to help youngsters from poorer families get to university.
Negative Examples.explanation: Although the text is about conservatives calling for a reform, it is too short and lacks important information, like "Scottish", or the type of the reform.

Negative Examples.input: Two Labour politicians have called for the Welsh Government to make face masks mandatory for people visiting hospitals.
Negative Examples.output: Two politicians have called for the Welsh Government to make face masks mandatory for people.
Negative Examples.explanation: This is a misleading title, as it doesn't mention the requirement is not for all people, and also, it is just a butchered form of the actual text. This is not a good title.

Negative Examples.input: High Covid-19 infection rates mean it is "too risky" to allow household support bubbles to be formed on the Isle of Man, the chief minister has told Tynwald.
Negative Examples.output: Eric Clapton to sell off guitars for Crossroads Centre
Negative Examples.explanation: The output is not at all relevant to the given text. Covid: Allowing support bubbles between Manx households 'too risky' would be a correct title.

Negative Examples.input: A body has been found in the search for a woman who went missing in floods after her car got stuck in water.
Negative Examples.output: Headline numbers: Feeling the OBR's pain
Negative Examples.explanation: This is not the suitable title. Title can be: Body found in search for woman missing in floods.
